entry.title: WIND WARNING , Victoria Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:52 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 9.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Harbour 3:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 9.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 8.7°C
Wind: NE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches. Wind light except southeast 30 km/h near Haro Strait. High 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Low 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then periods of rain. Wind southeast 30 km/h except 60 gusting to 80 near Haro Strait overnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
